sourcesContent:
<template>
  <navbar />
  <router-view />
  <notifications />
</template>

<script>
import {defineComponent} from 'vue';
import Navbar from '@/components/Navbar.vue';
import Notifications from "@/components/Notifications";

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    Notifications,
    Navbar,
  },
});
</script>

<style lang="scss">
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  font-family: inherit;
}

#app {
  font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
  min-height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;

  main {
    flex-grow: 1;
  }
}
</style>
